ing.item: Mccutcheon's apple butter or any mccutcheon's fruit butter

directions.step: Blend softened cream cheese and apple butter until smooth. Add eggs and blend well. Pour mixture into crust and bake at 350 F for 40 minutes. Cool completely. Spread top with a thin layer of apple butter. If desired serve with whipped topping and chopped walnuts. Posted to recipelu-digest Volume 01 Number 625 by James and Susan Kirkland <kirkland@gj.net> on Jan 28, 1998
